main event: A circular or disc-shaped object was observed shimmering in the sky over Palm Springs, California on 26 June 1960.
interesting points: The object was reported to be the size of a quarter,The sighting occurred at approximately 20,000 feet over the San Jacinto Mountains,The observer used binoculars to view the object which moved from west to west,The object veered at high speed just before disappearing,The observer suggested the object could have been a balloon or an astronomical phenomenon.
witness description: a pilot and his family members
